name: tm23
effect: Teaches Iron Tail to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Smack Down to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Iron Tail Gen I: Dragon Rage)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Slams the foe with
a hard tail. It may
lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Slams the foe with
a hard tail. It may
lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
An attack with a
steel-hard tail.
It may lower the
foe’s DEFENSE stat.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is slammed with a sturdy
tail of steel. It may also lower the
target’s Defense stat if it hits.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The foe is slammed with a sturdy
tail of steel. It may also lower the
target’s Defense stat if it hits.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The foe is slammed with a sturdy
tail of steel. It may also lower the
target’s Defense stat if it hits.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user throws a stone or projectile
to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon
will fall to the ground when it’s hit.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user throws a stone or projectile
to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon
will fall to the ground when it’s hit.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user throws a stone or similar projectile
to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon
will fall to the ground when it’s hit.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user throws a stone or similar projectile to
attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to
the ground when it’s hit.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user throws a stone or similar projectile to
attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to
the ground when it’s hit.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is punched with an electrified fist.
This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks and steals the target’s held item
simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it
already holds an item.
